titleStmt.title: An Electronic Edition of the Mishnah from the Leiden MS of the Yerushalmi (Leiden Or. 4720)
titleStmt.sponsor: Joseph and Rebecca Meyerhoff Center for Jewish Studies
Lieberman Institute; Primary Witnesses to Tannaitic Literature

publicationStmt.pubPlace: The Maryland Institute for Technology in the Humanities

availability.p: This work is copyright Hayim lapin and the Joseph and Rebecca Meyerhoff Center for Jewish Studies and licensed under a .

note.p: Mishnah text, extracted from the Leiden manuscript of the Palestian Talmud, MS Leiden Or. 4720, as published in .

Based on a transcription by Kerstin Ipta, Gerold Necker, Martina Urban und Gert Wildensee, last revision by Hans-Jürgen Becker. Responsibility by Peter Schäfer, Hans-Jürgen Becker. Converted to TEI by Gottfried Reeg using TUSCRIPT

handNote.persName: יחיאל בן יקותיאל בן בנימין הרופא
Yehiel b. Yequtiel b. Binyamins ha-Rofe

handNote.note: There are several annotators, of which one plays a dominant role. Lieberman identified him with יעקב בן חיים ן׳ אדוניהו מתונס; Susman was inclined to identify him with David Pizzighetone/דוד פיציגטון

revisionDesc.change: Sample transcription and markup of Bava Metsia Ch. 2
